programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Japan, Thailand, Turkey, and Mexico street foods inspire Dale to grill with dynamically preparing Chili-Cuman Lamb Mushroom sticks, Grilled pork and shrimp shumai, and scallion pancakes with brown butter labneh.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale skewers ribeye, salmon, smoky eggplant dip, and grilled peaches. Food on sticks never tasted better!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale fires up the tandoor grill, turning out juicy chicken thighs, smoky shrimp with Old Bay yogurt, crispy cauliflower, and a silky mango lassi dessert topped with crunchy candied pistachios. Tandoori done right!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale's turning up the heat! Carolina Reaper wings hotter than your ex, sweet-chili NY strip steak, smoky grilled chipotle Texas toast, and ancho-gochujang pineapple skillet cake for dessert. Bring some water!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Japan, Thailand, Turkey, and Mexico street foods inspire Dale to grill with dynamically preparing Chili-Cuman Lamb Mushroom sticks, Grilled pork and shrimp shumai, and scallion pancakes with brown butter labneh.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat travels to the Emerald Coast of Destin, Florida, to join his friend Adam Evans on a spearfishing adventure, sourcing fresh fish to cook over live fire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Roscoe Family Legacy: Alabama Pit Ribs
programme.desc: Pat heads to Birmingham to team up with artist and chef Roscoe Hall, cooking ribs inspired by Roscoe's family legacy.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Catching Gulf Coast Redfish and Blue Crabs
programme.desc: Pat visits Houston to go Gulf Bay fishing with chef Chris Shepherd, hoping to catch some redfish and gather a side of blue crabs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Hickory Smoked Virginia Ham & Mint Juleps
programme.desc: Pat Martin gets a history lesson on the origin of American barbecue from "The Professor" Tuffy Stone.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Pit-Cooked Chicken with Alabama White Sauce
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Decatur, Alabama to visit a storied institution of barbecue - Big Bob Gibson's. There, he learns the ins, the outs, and the history of a regional delicacy: pit-cooked chicken with Alabama white sauce.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin heads to the Cherokee National Forest for a day of fly fishing with an old friend, and to cook up their fresh catch over the campfire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Gainesboro, Tennessee to visit a free-range hog farm, learn about their operations, and grill up a less desired, but no less delicious, cut of hog - pork steaks.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin links up with his pal, Bill Darsinos, to enjoy a tradition from the heart of Bill's Greek culture when they cook a whole lamb on a spit roast.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: South Carolina Peach-Glazed Ribs with Rice Middlins
programme.desc: When Pat's friends and fellow barbecue chefs, Bryan Furman and Dr. Howard Conyers, come to town, the guys dig deep into the tricks and traditions of one of Bryan's specialties: pork ribs.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale skewers ribeye, salmon, smoky eggplant dip, and grilled peaches. Food on sticks never tasted better!

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Squid Salad and Crispy Squid on the Plancha
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern creates a vibrant salad where grilled squid is served with shaved fennel, cherry tomatoes, endive, and a lemon dressing. Then, Andrew shares his country-style squid on the plancha with fresh breadcrumbs, chilies, and a homemade aioli.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Chicken Fried Deer and Creole Halibut
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares chicken fried axis deer. Next, Chef Zimmern poaches halibut in tomato roux.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Striped Bass Crudo and Smoky Summer Succotash
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern celebrates summer's bounty with an elegant bass crudo and a whole roasted striped bass topped with an herb-packed compound butter and served alongside a smoky corn succotash studded with charred poblanos.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern breaks down a whole tuna and serves it three ways: grilled, raw, and poached.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Mediterranean Grilled Filets and Salt Crusted Halibut
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern elevates California halibut, first with grilled fillets on saffron labneh with romesco and roasted cabbage. Then, he demonstrates a classic salt-crusted whole halibut, served with whole roasted cauliflower and a rich cream sauce.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern transforms wild duck into a simple grilled appetizer inspired by Japanese tataki and then uses the rest of the duck to make open fire duck noodle soup with fresh egg noodles, lots of aromatic herbs, bean sprouts and squeeze of lime.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern demystifies working with live sea urchin and scallops by creating a showstopping seafood risotto.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Quail Noodle Salad and Antelope Stew
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern creates Vietnamese cold noodle salad and grilled quail. Next, chef makes antelope stew.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern makes two different dishes with red snapper: fried snapper fingers with a spicy chile-orange mayonnaise dipping sauce and a slow-roasted whole fish with an herb salad and charred miso sweet potatoes.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Venison Paillard and Hearty Hunter's Stew
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases venison two ways: a delicate grilled paillard with artichokes and parmesan, and a rich, slow-braised Polish hunter's stew with kielbasa, mushrooms, and sauerkraut. Served with grilled leeks and coal-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess heads to Wyatt Ranches in South Texas to check out the cattle ranching operation they've been running since 1965.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess visits Northstar Bison to learn about the small family-run ranch's breeding and processing operation, then prepares her signature smash burger.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Alpine Lamb Ribs from Siddoway Sheep Company
programme.desc: Jess joins the lamb-raising Siddoway family as they begin sorting the animals that are ready for processing. She then returns to the lodge, where she demonstrates how to prepare and grill lamb ribs.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores Minnesota's forests for wild mushrooms. He creates a simple grilled mushroom salad, then hand-shapes cavatelli pasta tossed with golden chanterelles, butter, garlic, thyme, and colatura. He shares foraging and cleaning tips.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Southern Shrimp Skewers and Asian Crispy Rice
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern grills beloved shrimp in two distinct ways. He starts with jumbo shrimp and country ham skewers glazed with sweet-hot pepper jelly. Then, he creates Asian-inspired shrimp, served over crispy battle rice and a complex sambal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Turkey Legs, Creamed Greens and Lemon Orzo
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares Grilled Turkey Legs, Creamed Greens and Lemon Orzo.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess heads to Wyatt Ranches in South Texas to check out the cattle ranching operation they've been running since 1965.
